channel.title: Tab Buttons
channel.description:
How do I remove the logout buttons and music buttons in the bottom row of your inventory? Also, how do I give clanchat an icon?
I want the music and logout buttons to be unclickable blank stones and the clanchat button to have a picture. Help?
-- If anybody could send me guides or walk me through it, I would be in debt :P
[img]http://i.imgur.com/oL4IQtG.png[/img]

item.title: Tab Buttons
item.dc:creator: @DaGamerChild DaGamerChild
item.description:
@DaGamerChild wrote:

Didn’t mean to sound that nooby, haha. I’m actually reading Java for Dummies and Java for Absolute Beginners now and I’m listed in Java 1 at my school for the next half of the year. Thanks, for the first half though, that worked, but my client sided has all these different revisions and they’re not labeled. I’ll get it eventually, you helped lots.

Read full topic

item.title: Tab Buttons
item.dc:creator: @3lv3n_snip3r 3lv3n snip3r
item.description:
@3lv3n_snip3r wrote:

To change the interface on a tab, go into Client.java, server sided, and search for: setSidebarInterface
There should be like 10+ lines that are similar but with different numbers… Example: setSidebarInterface(5, 5608);
It is drawing the interface with the ID of 5608 on the 5th tab.

For the tab icons, go into client.java, client sided, and search for: public void drawSideIcons()
In that method, will be all of the icons that are drawn on the main interface, which is just a sprite drawn from your cache (Your inventory interface).

If you can’t change what you want with what I told you, you should quit RSPS’s and actually learn how to program with Java.

Read full topic
